trans-unit.target: / 运算符 (Visual Basic 中) |Microsoft 文档
/ 运算符 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: Divides two numbers and returns a floating-point result.
trans-unit.target: 使两个数字相除，返回浮点结果。
语法
部件
必需。
任何数值表达式。
必需。
任何数值表达式。
支持的类型

trans-unit.source: All numeric types, including the unsigned and floating-point types and `Decimal`.
trans-unit.target: 所有数值类型，包括无符号和浮点类型和`Decimal`。
结果

trans-unit.source: The result is the full quotient of `expression1` divided by `expression2`, including any remainder.
trans-unit.target: 结果是完整的商`expression1`除以`expression2`，包括任何余数。

trans-unit.source: The [\ Operator (Visual Basic)](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/integer-division-operator.md) returns the integer quotient, which drops the remainder.
trans-unit.target: [\ 运算符 (Visual Basic)](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/integer-division-operator.md)返回整数的商，将删除其余部分。
备注

trans-unit.source: The data type of the result depends on the types of the operands.
trans-unit.target: 结果的数据类型取决于操作数的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how the data type of the result is determined.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示如何确定结果的数据类型。
操作数数据类型
结果数据类型

trans-unit.source: Both expressions are integral data types ([SByte](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/sbyte-data-type.md), [Byte](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/byte-data-type.md), [Short](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/short-data-type.md), [UShort](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/ushort-data-type.md), [Integer](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/integer-data-type.md), [UInteger](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/uinteger-data-type.md), [Long](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/long-data-type.md), [ULong](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/ulong-data-type.md))
trans-unit.target: 这两个表达式都是整数数据类型 ([SByte](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/sbyte-data-type.md)，[字节](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/byte-data-type.md)，[短](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/short-data-type.md)， [UShort](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/ushort-data-type.md)，[整数](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/integer-data-type.md)， [UInteger](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/uinteger-data-type.md)，[长](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/long-data-type.md)， [ULong](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/ulong-data-type.md))

trans-unit.source: One expression is a [Single](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/single-data-type.md) data type and the other is not a [Double](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/double-data-type.md)
trans-unit.target: 一个表达式是[单个](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/single-data-type.md)数据类型，另一个不是[Double](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/double-data-type.md)

trans-unit.source: One expression is a [Decimal](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/decimal-data-type.md) data type and the other is not a [Single](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/single-data-type.md) or a [Double](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/double-data-type.md)
trans-unit.target: 一个表达式是[十进制](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/decimal-data-type.md)数据类型，另一个不是[单个](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/single-data-type.md)或[Double](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/double-data-type.md)

trans-unit.source: Either expression is a [Double](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/double-data-type.md) data type
trans-unit.target: 其中任何一个表达式是[Double](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/double-data-type.md)数据类型

trans-unit.source: Before division is performed, any integral numeric expressions are widened to `Double`.
trans-unit.target: 执行除法运算之前，将任何整数数值表达式被扩展为`Double`。

trans-unit.source: If you assign the result to an integral data type, Visual Basic attempts to convert the result from `Double` to that type.
trans-unit.target: 如果将结果分配给整型数据类型，请尝试将转换的结果 Visual Basic`Double`为该类型。

trans-unit.source: This can throw an exception if the result does not fit in that type.
trans-unit.target: 如果结果无法容纳在该类型，这可以引发异常。

trans-unit.source: In particular, see "Attempted Division by Zero" on this Help page.
trans-unit.target: 请参见此帮助页上的"尝试用零作除数"。

trans-unit.source: If `expression1` or `expression2` evaluates to [Nothing](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md), it is treated as zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression1`或`expression2`的计算结果为[Nothing](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md)，它将被视为零。
尝试被零除

trans-unit.source: If `expression2` evaluates to zero, the `/` operator behaves differently for different operand data types.
trans-unit.target: 如果`expression2`计算结果为零，`/`运算符的操作数数据类型不同的行为以不同的方式。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the possible behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示可能的行为。
操作数数据类型
行为如果`expression2`为零
浮点 (`Single`或`Double`)

trans-unit.source: Returns infinity (<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity> or <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity>), or <xref:System.Double.NaN> (not a number) if `expression1` is also zero
trans-unit.target: 返回无穷大 (<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>或<xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity>)，或<xref:System.Double.NaN>（而不是数字） 如果`expression1`也为零</xref:System.Double.NaN></xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity></xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>
将引发<xref:System.DivideByZeroException></xref:System.DivideByZeroException>
整数 （有符号或无符号）

trans-unit.source: Attempted conversion back to integral type throws <xref:System.OverflowException> because integral types cannot accept <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>, <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity>, or <xref:System.Double.NaN>
trans-unit.target: 尝试转换回整数类型，则会引发<xref:System.OverflowException>因为整数类型不能接受<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>， <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity>，或<xref:System.Double.NaN></xref:System.Double.NaN></xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity></xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity></xref:System.OverflowException>

trans-unit.source: The `/` operator can be *overloaded*, which means that a class or structure can redefine its behavior when an operand has the type of that class or structure.
trans-unit.target: `/`运算符可以被*重载*，这意味着，某个类或结构可以重新定义其行为时，操作数的类或结构的类型。

trans-unit.source: If your code uses this operator on such a class or structure, be sure you understand its redefined behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的代码对这样的类或结构中使用此运算符，请确保您了解其被重新定义的行为。
有关详细信息，请参阅[运算符过程](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/operator-procedures.md)。
示例

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `/` operator to perform floating-point division.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用`/`运算符执行浮点除法运算。

trans-unit.source: The result is the quotient of the two operands.
trans-unit.target: 结果是两个操作数的商。
[!code-vb[VbVbalrOperators #&16;](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/codesnippet/VisualBasic/floating-point-division-operator_1.vb)]

trans-unit.source: The expressions in the preceding example return values of 2.5 and 3.333333.
trans-unit.target: 在前面的示例表达式返回 2.5 和 3.333333 的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result is always floating-point (`Double`), even though both operands are integer constants.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，结果始终是浮点 (`Double`)，即使这两个操作数都是整数常量。
